title: Head Girls Basketball Coach (with possible teaching assignment)
description: This Head Girls Basketball coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with the possibility of a full time teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.  An active Utah Secondary Education License is required for the teaching assignment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Marcus Matua, at marcus.matua@wa...
